Primary_Text: кылыс да делӧыс лэбын моз вожалӧ
IPA: kɨlɨs da ɟelɘɨs lebɨn moz voʒalɘ
Analyzed: kɨl-ɨs da ɟelɘ-ɨs lebɨn moz voʒal-ɘ
Gloss: word-DEF.NOM and act-DEF.NOM pitchfork like split-PRS.3SG
Translation: words and deeds split like [the teeth on] a pitchfork
my father and the other members of the family
the red cow licks the black cow
I do not write/I will not write

Primary_Text: регыд ми лоам век кежлӧ ӧтлаынӧсь
IPA: regɨd mi loam vek keʒlɘ ɘtlaɨnɘɕ
Analyzed: regɨd mi lo-a-m vek keʒlɘ ɘtlaɨn-ɘɕ
Translation: soon we will be together forever
when the harvesting of crops is over we will organise a wedding
The father was a party member.

Primary_Text: найӧ кутасны бурӧн казьтыны миянлысь ним
IPA: najɘ kutasnɨ burɘn kaʑtɨnɨ mijanlɨɕ ɲim
Analyzed: najɘ kut-asnɨ bur-ɘn kaʑt-ɨnɨ mijan-lɨɕ ɲim
Translation: they will recall our name(s) with appreciation
In Moscow and alike cities there is almost everything.

Primary_Text: Том морт помаліс Москваса государственнӧй юридическӧй университет
IPA: tom mort pomalis moskvasa gosudarstvenːɘj juriɟit͡ɕeskɘj uɲiverɕicet
Analyzed: tom mort pomal-is moskva-sa gosudarstvenːɘj juriɟit͡ɕeskɘj uɲiverɕicet
Gloss: young man.NOM finish-PST1.3SG Moscow-ADJ state.ADJ law.ADJ university.NOM
Translation: The young man graduated from the Moscow State University of Law.

Primary_Text: том фельдшер, коді помаліс Сыктывкарса медколледж
IPA: tom feʎdʃer, kodi pomalis sɨktɨvkarsa medkoʎːed͡ʒ
Analyzed: tom feʎdʃer, kodi pomal-is sɨktɨvkar-sa medkoʎːed͡ʒ
Gloss: young feldsher.NOM REL finish-PST1.3SG Syktyvkar-ADJ medical.college.NOM
Translation: a young feldsher who graduated from the Syktyvkar college

Primary_Text: Челядь шензьӧмӧн видзӧдӧны, кыдзи уджалӧ комбайн
IPA: t͡ɕeʎaɟ ʃenʑɘmɘn vid͡ʑɘdɘnɨ, kɨd͡ʑi ud͡ʒalɘ kombajn
Analyzed: t͡ɕeʎaɟ ʃenʑ-ɘm-ɘn vid͡ʑɘd-ɘnɨ, kɨd͡ʑi ud͡ʒal-ɘ kombajn
Gloss: child.PL be.surprised-AN-INS look-PRS.3PL how work-PRS.3SG combine.harvester
Translation: The children watched the combine work with amazement.

Primary_Text: Шонді петтӧдз колхозникъяс уджалісны му вылын
IPA: ʃondi petːɘd͡ʑ kolxozɲikjas ud͡ʒalisnɨ mu vɨlɨn
Analyzed: ʃondi pet-ːɘd͡ʑ kolxozɲik-jas ud͡ʒal-isnɨ mu vɨl-ɨn
Gloss: sun exit-CVB.SEQ kolkhoz.worker-PL work-PST1.3PL earth on-INE
Translation: By the time the sun rose the kolkhoz workers had been working in the field.

Primary_Text: Рӧднӧй завод йылысь думайтігӧн сьӧлӧмыслы вӧлі кокни
IPA: rɘdnɘj zavod jɨlɨɕ dumajtigɘn ɕɘlɘmɨslɨ vɘli kokɲi
Analyzed: rɘdnɘj zavod jɨlɨɕ dumajt-igɘn ɕɘlɘm-ɨs-lɨ vɘli kokɲi
Gloss: native factory about think-CVB.SYN heart.PX.3SG.DAT COP.PST1 light
Translation: While thinking about the factory at home he felt lightness in his heart.
I am having a knife forged by a smith.
But, you know, the day was very quiet.
Haven't we forgotten anything after all?
One says that I am stockier than him.

Primary_Text: Совхозса выль директор та йылысь тöдö?
IPA: sovxozsɑ vɨʎ ɟirektor tɑ jɨlɨɕ tɘdɘ
Analyzed: sovxoz-sɑ vɨʎ ɟirektor tɑ jɨlɨɕ tɘd-ɘ
Gloss: sovkhoz-ADJ new direktor this about know-PRS.3SG
Translation: Does the new director of the sovkhoz know about it?
Houses are being built by carpenters
By doing so, he tried to gather up more courage (lit. to make himself brave(r)).
writings which have not been published in a journal

Primary_Text: тэ медся шуда мортыс му вылас
IPA: te medɕa ʃuda mortɨs mu vɨlas
Analyzed: te medɕa ʃud-a mort-ɨs mu vɨl-as
Translation: You (familiar) are the happiest person in the world.

Primary_Text: Ті ӧд тӧданныд, мый менам невестаӧй шань
IPA: ti ɘd tɘdanːɨd, mɨj menam ɲevestaɘj ʃaɲ
Analyzed: ti ɘd tɘd-anːɨd, mɨj menam ɲevesta-ɘj ʃaɲ
Translation: But you know that my daughter-in-law is good (as a person).

Primary_Text: мунӧ вӧлі туй кузя, кор ме видзӧдлі ӧшиньӧд
IPA: munɘ vɘli tuj kuʑa, kor me vid͡ʑɘdli ɘʃiɲɘd
Analyzed: mun-ɘ vɘl-i tuj kuʑa, kor me vid͡ʑɘdl-i ɘʃiɲ-ɘd
Gloss: go-PRS.3SG be-PST1 road along when 1SG look-1SG window-PROL
Translation: He was going down the road when I looked through the window.
I am writing with a pen
